title: Emerald and Diamond Moti Choker Haaram - A Timeless Classic
features: Exquisitely crafted choker haaram featuring a floral motif design with a central emerald pendant. The necklace is intricately studded with brilliant-cut diamonds. Dangling freshwater pearls (Moti) add a touch of traditional elegance. The gold base features a lustrous Hyderabadi polish.
occasions: and other special occasions. It's also a statement piece for formal events.
description: This Moti Choker Haaram embodies timeless elegance and cultural significance. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, it showcases a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design elements with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality diamonds, emeralds, rubies and pearls makes this piece a treasured heirloom.
